title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1653/85 of 18 June 1985 fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1653/85
of 18 June 1985
fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1985/86 marketing year, the amount of the levy referred to under the second subparagraph of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 is hereby fixed at 4,25 ECU per 100 kilograms of white sugar.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 June 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
